resources.string: One cunning American was a drug dealer since his student days, and now he came up with a scheme of illegal enrichment using the estates of the impoverished English aristocracy and very well on it. Another nosy journalist comes to Ray, the American\'s right hand, and offers him to buy a screenplay in which the crimes of his boss are described in detail with the participation of other representatives of the London the criminal world - a Jewish partner, the Chinese diaspora, black athletes and even Russian oligarch ..

The dangerous world of corruption and the life of London\'s criminal scum where real estate ousted such a leader in the trading market as drugs, and criminal gangs became the most active entrepreneurs. But to everyone who wants to do their business there, be it a small fry One-Two or Russian shadow billionaire Yuri Omovich, you will first have to agree with one human - Lenny Cole.

Four young men have saved up Â£ 25,000 each for one of the he could play cards with an experienced sharper and a hardened criminal known by the nickname Harry Axe. The guy ended up losing 500 thousand, he was given a week to pay the debt. Otherwise case, and he and his \"sponsors\" every day will be chopped off on the finger, and then ... out of the situation, the guys decided to rob the bandits who decided to rob three \"nerds\" growing marijuana for the local drug lord. But this adventure of the four is not end ...

Seven years ago, Jake got into trouble. The city was obsessed with illegal gambling organized by the crime boss Mac. One day on the eve of a big game, Mac lost his boyfriend, and Jake Green was offered to replace. Under pressure, Green agreed and won at the card table. Since this all started.
